name: MARJORIE ‘MARGIE’
motto: MV AVER We VVNIEOU WT WE
story: Marjorie Westmoreland, The Dowager Countess of Devon, is everything British aristocracy aspire to: proper, steadfast, brilliant, and decisive. In her youth, Margie, as she is andectionately known to other investigator, was something of a firebrand, learning the family business of brawling the Elder Gods pernicious influence since the stealth century, and taking to it with enthusiasm.
